mapper.select: SELECT id, seller_id, user_id, order_no, good_snapshot_id, delivery_no, delivery_id, order_status, order_type, pay_type, message, recipients, phone, province, city, area, address, post_code, good_name, count, wx_order_no, create_date, pay_date, delivery_date, good_id, use_ticket, ticket_id, prepay_id, remark, refund_date, update_date, freight_fee, good_fee, payment_fee, reduce_fee, order_fee, refund_fee, send_good_id, operate_point, use_point FROM t_order WHERE user_id=#{userId}
